column1: The support team resolved my issue quickly. Very satisfied!
I had to wait on hold for over an hour. Terrible service.
The representative was very helpful and polite.
I'm unhappy with the response I received. Issue still unresolved.
Great experience! The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable.
The agent was rude and unprofessional.
My problem was fixed within minutes. Excellent service!
I felt like my concerns were not taken seriously.
The chat support was quick and efficient.
I appreciate the follow-up call to ensure everything was okay.
